casebody.data:
[Cite as 12/31/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-7048.]

December 31, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-1580. In re B.E.

Cuyahoga App. No. 81781. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal involving termination of parental rights/adoption. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of court of appeals’ judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of court of appeals’ judgment be, and hereby is, granted.

Pfeifer and O’Connor, JJ., dissent.
